data.message: Happy Birthday, Facebook and thanks for give a video but unfortunately i don't share that video on my timeline.... so please can you help me to How to recover that video which was made by facebook for me? That was awesome for me so i want to back that video.... Is there any way to back my video ? Please help me I'll be very happy if i back that...... Thanks in advance

replies.message: Happy to help, Aulia. You can visit http://on.fb.me/1RazKig to see your video. -Jordan
I got it & Thanks for stay with us, Jordan..
